reviews.review: Amazing return of the Half Life series, Half Life 2 has changed nearly everything since the first instance into better, better textures, better graphics, better character models, story line etc. Half Life 2 is a huge upgrade from the original Half Life and I highly recommend you play it if you haven't before.
zamanında dünyaya damga vuran bir oyun herkese oynamasını önerrim
Бедный Лазло...Лучший в своем роде...и такой конец?
sadece şunu diyecem oynayı ve görün.
This will leave a lasting impact on you long after its over. Wow, what a ride.

I loved this game! The story immersion was fantastic. It was hard at times. It was a little slow at times. But that all added to the story of being in a dystopian future. The sequel chapters were a great addition after finishing this one.
Крутая игра ,но лямбда искатель прям сложное капец
The physics engine is what makes this game better than most other fps games and it has a cool story so i would recommend you play
ИГРА ОЧЕНЬ ХОРОШАЯ  ЗАХВАТЫВАЮЩИЙ СЮЖЕТ СТОИТ СВОИХ ДЕНЕГ (ГЕЙБ ГДЕ СУКА 3 ЧАСТЬ)

After finally playing all of the original Half-Life games, it's a breath of fresh air for the second game to take me on a huge update to the world and lore. One of the smartest FPS games with a few tough moments to keep you on your toes.
an absolute epic made way before it's time, impressive physics even by today's standards.

Bardzo ciekawa gra, jeżeli planujesz kupno to NIE PLANUJ ANI CHWILI DŁUŻEJ. Po prostu jedna z najlepszych gier w które grałem i po ukończeniu człowiek chciałby grać jeszcze drugie tyle (od tego są episode'y :P)

I was late to the Half-Life craze, but recently I've gotten caught up to prepare for Alyx. I mainly avoided the series due to the notorious lack of a finale, but let me just say: I hate myself for not playing Half-Life sooner.
Half-Life 2 has to be the best game ever created when viewed from a contemporary standpoint. What other game has this sort of riveting action, engrossing soundtrack, and lovable characters, all topped with a physics engine that was way ahead of its time, in 2004?! I had to pinch myself every couple hours and remind myself that this one is old enough to drive.
Thank you, Half-Life 2, for revolutionizing the gaming industry on this level.
And thank you, Valve, for making such a glorious snack bar.
toda su saga es bastante buena y muy divertida
Nearly as good as first Half Life. One of the all time great PC games.
Пройдена вдоль и поперек более 20ти раз, но по прежнему любима.
Нужный человек не в том месте может перевернуть мир.

Benim için Half-Life serisi, dünyada gelmiş geçmiş en iyi oyun serilerinden biridir. Bu serinin yine önde gelen oyunları olan Half-Life 2'yi, dönemine göre çok gelişme kateden grafik motoru, senaryo ve hikayesi, mekanikler ve aksiyon açısından kesinlikle öneririm.
好玩啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊

前前后后打了有一礼拜了（每天玩一点儿）
剧情我tm赞爆
不得不说游戏的bgm不知道给游戏增色多少
起初怀着好奇接近这部神作直到水障碍区开车躲炸弹那关配上那首Lambda Core(搜了好久找到的）那感觉就像是上了天
“我已出仓，感觉良好”
知道那时我才决心无论花多长时间都一定要亲自通关
在bgm渲染下每个紧张刺激的地方都肾上腺素激增
一开始的物理学圣剑到手枪到重力枪霰弹枪等到最后的高配重力枪，点起来就只有三个字
“爽爽爽”
强烈推荐像我一样刚接触或者还没接触这款游戏的人好好玩一下，这电影般的游戏体验绝对不会让你后悔
（话说不是这次V设免费开放游玩半条命等系列我都忘记曾经买了这款游戏，毕竟折后优惠太香，剁手后又不去玩）
还有就是莱温霍姆那关是真的恶梦啊！！我坚决不会在玩第二次的！！恐怖气氛渲染到位（话说只是你胆小吧啊喂）
猎头蟹这么可爱为什么要杀....啊啊啊啊啊不要扑过来啊啊啊啊从我身上拿开啊啊啊啊！!!@_@
游戏中有很多很多很多彩蛋等待你们去挖掘（我一心跟剧情完全没在看的呢）
总之，大师级作品，谁玩谁知道
Ну тупа пока бесплатно можно поиграть, кто не играл советую

It's Half-Life 2, what did you expect?
You shoot the Combine, you get a Gravity Controlling Gun, you hit Headcrabs with a Crowbar.
It's a Half Life, but a Sequel.
画质很好，配置要求也很低，就是玩着玩着头会晕

10/10 the physics and shooting are top notch considering this game was made over 10 years ago.  The striders take way to many rockets to kill though. Considering the quality of this game I am super excited for half life alyx.
Not bad. I'd consider buying a sequel

I've bought this game recently and I'm quite addicted to it to the point where I'm playing more of this game then Team Fortress 2 which is one of my favourite games. Also this game has aged pretty well,

so i think it deserves an 11/10. Truly a timeless master piece.

The [b]BEST STORY GAME[/b] of all time, despite it's graphics, it's really awesome, and it'll be my favourite game of all time.

Peguei 100% das conquistas recentemente, e recomendo sim o jogo,  física realista(99% do tempo), inimigos com uma IA melhor que de mineirinho e rodou tudo no máximo na minha máquina de fazer chinelo, porém quando você já completa o game não te sobra muito pra fazer além de pegar as conquistas,sugiro esperar chegar  a promoção, pois apesar de quão bom o jogo é,20 reais no Brasil é foda.
半条命2作为一个04年出的游戏，而我第一次却在08年玩到，当时小学生的我，觉得cs1.6和cf两个游戏就是我对FPS的认知了，结果半条命把当时年少无知的我，打开了眼界。半条命2起源引擎带来的画面，和物理引擎对于我来说都是一个不小的视觉冲击。特别水的效果，在当时我的眼中是多么震撼，也是游玩半条命2，也让我认识到了V社，也知道了cs系列,求生之路系列。在现在2020年再一次回顾这游戏，真的不错。
До сих пор отличная и шедевральная игра. Хоть и сейчас 2022 год !
私がｆｐｓにはまるきっかけとなった作品です。ストーリー世界観もしっかりしており、シリーズすべておすすめです。画質は現在のｆｐｓにかないませんが、ゲームシステムは楽しくおすすめです。
玩到最后激光那里就闪退，好几次都过不去
玩了2才知道玩起来有多舒服，不愧是神作！
It's pretty epic. Worth every dollar.
这就是g胖数不来3的游戏，这么多年了，曾经的神作如今看着画质不忍入目，但是作为经典游戏还是可以玩玩看的，价格合理，打折时很便宜，作为steam自家的游戏还是可以入手一玩。
